data.name: Anime Collector: Evo
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist "Anime Collector: Evo"


JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

EVO, a city of hopes and dreams where reputation, worth, and status are displayed through your collection of unique artworks and items. Join the world of Anime Collector:Evo (today) for free and forge your own path to virtual wealth.

Explore the massive city of Evo and discover its secrets with a friend or on your own. Claim items via quests, Win items with minigames. Speak to NPCs and discover riches that have not been discovered yet and then at the end of the day buy a home and furnish it with any item that you have claimed in Evo.

Can you make it to the top? Can you find the legendary items that Evo has waiting to be discovered?


Steam Inventory Enabled
  • All items rewarded are marketable and tradable.


Mini Games:
  • Slot Machine
  • Lottery
  • Player Bets

Personal Home / Land
  • Purchase land or a Home and invite friends to visit!

Quests
  • Take on quests to discover new art or items. The more difficult the quest the rarer the item that you may potentially earn.

NPCs
  • Speak to NPCs to start quests. Some NPCs may just want a chat, Some may even tell you locations of legendary items that require you to gather items or complete tasks.

Combat
  • Defeat rare monsters to gather their loot.
Modular Weapon System
  • Collection different ranged weapon modules to truly make a weapon that suits you. The rarer the weapon module the more powerful it is!

Taming
  • Every single monster inside of EVO can be tamed and trained to fight by your side!

Pets
  • Little cosmetic friends that follow you to the end of the earth!

data.short_description: Anime Collector: EVO is a adult open-world MMORPG. Earn your status, worth and reputation through finding rare art,items and resources. Do this by completing quests, defeating monsters, finding hidden secrets and playing various mini games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.legal_notice:
This game is intended for ages 18 and over. The game contains nudity and sexual references.
Do not PURCHASE or PLAY "Anime Collector: Evo" if you are younger then 18 years of age!

All Male/Female characters represented in this game are over the age of 18 years old.

This game is a work of fiction and does not represent real world scenarios in any way shape or form. This includes Trailers,Images,Sounds and anything else related to "Anime Collector: Evo"
We do not take responsibility for any misuse of this application.
